title: Brat Girl Summer
description: Brat Girl Summer is the ultimate dress-up game where style meets attitude! Join four besties as you style them in trendy outfits inspired by K-pop and VSCO aesthetics. Mix and match tops, skirts, dresses, shoes, and accessories to create bold, eye-catching looks. Whether you're designing a fierce K-pop stage outfit or a laid-back VSCO vibe, endless fashion possibilities await. Get ready to slay the summer with your unique style creations!
